column4: Is it possible to complete disable my wireless card? I cannot do this in the bios on this laptop. And removing the module (bcm43xx) freezes the laptop
you can blacklist it but I cannot remember how maybr google can help
thanks, ill give that a go
good luck
thanks, apparently one of my cpus are totaly out of control, and i have narrowed it down to the wireless card
Sterlng, when you pm as a forum you exclude 1100 people from knowledge
So did you blacklist bcm43xx??
just trying to figure out how. If i just remove the module, the laptop freezes.. :/
apparently its easy, /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist :)
there is a lot on bcm43xx at ubuntu forums they can be a real pita
alright, i'll read up on it :)
coool
i dont need the wireless card, so its just a pain in the donkey
well.. .rebooting :)
you back up yet
yeah, just checking
so far, nothing out of control :)
yeah you can put that as a win yes??:-))
module not loaded, ksoftirq/1 not going wild
yup, thats a win :D
thanks!
didnt do much just forgot a command hee
hehe, thanks anyhow :)
